content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Coal Mining and Storage at position(x=43.0, y=-82.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner Mining Drill (position x=43.0, y=-82.0) with a drop position at (x=42.5, y=-83.5)
-  Chest (position x=42.5, y=-83.5) to store mined coal
-  Furnace (position x=41.0, y=-82.0) for smelting coal into iron-plate
-  Burner Inserter (position x=43.5, y=-80.5) to transport coal from the mining drill to the furnace or other chests
-  Chest (position x=43.5, y=-79.5) to store additional coal
-  Chest (position x=44.5, y=-81.5) and Chest (position x=45.5, y=-80.5) for additional storage

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when extracting items from a chest
-  Ensure the chest contains the item you are trying to extract before attempting extraction
### Errors when using a burner mining drill
-  Ensure the burner mining drill has fuel before attempting to mine
-  Ensure the chest at the drop position is not full before attempting to mine
### Errors when using a burner inserter
-  Ensure the burner inserter has a source of items to pick up before attempting to transport items
-  Ensure the drop position is not full before attempting to transport items
